experience.description: Working on improving shipping accuracy and reducing food waste, using data gathered from carrier tracking scans and our homegrown WMS.

Floor supervisor at an e-commerce distribution center. Managed a capacity balancing model and wrote an algorithm to rotate order pickers through work stations that was loosely based on Reddit's "hot" scoring system.
Bachelors in Economics & International Relations. Coursework in econometrics, game theory, corporate strategy, and computer science.
Interned at a startup beverage company that supports indigenous communities in Ecuador.
